content.p: This page contains the University's policy on the legibility of all work that is submitted for assessment. Its content is applicable to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses. Includes: responsibilities of the candidate; candidate refusal; candidate agreement and actions Includes: self-identification; illegible handwriting 1 or equivalent at University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM) or University of Nottingham Ningbo China (UNNC). For more information about Disability Support Services, please consult the following: Disability Support Services Includes: restrictions; costs Student Services Academic-Service-Office@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
